sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update the "feedback value" column from a choice list to a string column. This for Tokyo upgrades.</description>
        <name>Update prediction output feedback value</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateIARFeedbackValue();

function updateIARFeedbackValue() {
	var choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
	choiceGr.addQuery('name', AutoResolutionConstants.PREDICTION_OUTPUT_TABLE_NAME);
	choiceGr.addQuery('element', 'feedback_value');
	choiceGr.setValue("inactive", true);
	choiceGr.updateMultiple();
	
	var columnGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	columnGr.addQuery('name', AutoResolutionConstants.PREDICTION_OUTPUT_TABLE_NAME);
	columnGr.addQuery('element', 'feedback_value');
	columnGr.query();
	
	//No need to update value if field doesn't exist or it is already a String type
	if (!columnGr.next() || columnGr.getValue('internal_type') === 'string'){
		return;
	}
	
	columnGr.setValue('internal_type', 'string');
	columnGr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-02 17:35:42</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2ba3504843f91110a8ea143d9ab8f23b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update prediction output feedback value</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">81ddf4a03c75311068bcf327dfe37fa6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_2ba3504843f91110a8ea143d9ab8f23b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-11-02 17:36:08</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
